page.title: 16Before and After School
page.content:
An ordinary day, by Leigh,aged 10
I usually get up at 7.30 when my mother calls me. I get out of bed and my breakfast is waiting for me on the table. I go to school at 8.25 and arrive at 8.45. That gives me quarter of an hour to play in the yard.
After school I walk home with my friend Richard. When I get home I change and go and call my other friend Kevin. We play badminton until we have to go in. Once inside I have my tea and get changed. I then watch television until I have to go to bed. When I get into bed I play with my BMX Burner Game, and then when I'm tired I go to sleep.
